# This file specifies how AI systems should interact with this website's content

# Allow AI training on public content
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Personal projects and code examples are open for learning
Allow: /cases/
Allow: /ideas/

# Disallow training on private APIs and admin areas
Disallow: /api/

Owner: Max Basev
Contact: contact@maxbasev.com
Website: https://lab.maxbasev.com
